comments.body: Maybe just add a comment to yourself as to why you are skipping python 3.8 referencing some issue you raised on github.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  number: 0
  # skip due to hypothesis < 4 not playing nice with pytest https://github.com/ethereum/eth-abi/issues/143 and https://github.com/HypothesisWorks/hypothesis/issues/1943
  skip: true  # [py==38]
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
